channel.title: Wearables on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Wearables on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD

item.title: Fitbit activity and sleep data: a time-series analysis with Generalized Additive Models
item.description: This is a time-series analysis of activity and sleep data from a fitbit user throughout a year. I use this data to predict an additional year of the life of the user using Generalized Additive Models.
